laboratory_examinations.findings: Glycosylated hemoglobin between 6.5 and 6.9% after treatment with glibenclamide
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved metabolic control with reduction in levels

laboratory_examinations.findings: Insulin requirement varied between 0.15 and 0.4 U/kg/day
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Insulin therapy was stable with no episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal psychomental development and normal formal developmental test

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Examination for Diabetic Retinopathy and Nephropathy
